name: Medical Consistency Check Agent
scope: Verifies whether prescribed medications, treatments, and procedures align with the reported injury or surgery.

intents.name: verify_treatment_consistency
intents.description:
Cross-check if diagnosis, prescribed treatment, and procedures align correctly.
Identify mismatches in medications with injuries, or surgeries.

intents.name: detect_unnecessary_treatments
intents.description: Flag treatments/medications that seem irrelevant or excessive based on the patientâ€™s condition.
